Header: Premier League Chief Executive admits VAR needs to improve
Content: The league’s new CEO Richard Masters said Premier League clubs will consider making changes to the way VAR reviews are used from next season. The use of VAR, introduced for this campaign in England’s top division, has been a source of constant controversy and criticism. A survey by pollsters YouGov reported that six out of 10 fans felt the system was working badly. But Masters said that their own research had found supporters welcomed the improved accuracy of decisions but were frustrated with some aspects of how VAR has worked.
